product_name: Merrell River Glove Water Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made to wade, the women's Merrell River Glove Water Shoes free your feet to explore the waters, gripping wet surfaces with reliable Vibram(R) traction. Synthetic leather and mesh uppers create tough, flexible and breathable barriers around your feet; soft neoprene linings feel good next to skin. Adjustable instep straps provide a precise, glovelike fit. 0mm heel-to-toe drop offers a natural stride and keeps you feeling connected to the terrain. Integrated footbeds feature Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial treatment to deter odors. 4mm of cushioning makes outdoor adventures easy on your feet. Nonmarking Vibram rubber outsoles provide excellent grip in wet environs. Closeout.
short_description: Made to wade, the women's Merrell River Glove Water Shoes free your feet to explore the waters, gripping wet surfaces with reliable Vibram(R) traction.
